description:
In Victorian England, the young orphan Wisteria begs for scraps. Able to see through demons’ disguises, she befriends the immortal Marbas, lonely after centuries of solitude. He finds kinship with the human girl, even while evading the brutal Sword Cross Knights—including Wisteria’s brother. Is it possible for two souls so different to find happiness together, and what price must they pay?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

name.native: シャーロック・ホームズ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mkt_0220) | [Official Website](https://twpf.jp/MKT_0220)

Their sister is Rina Hoshino, bassist of the all-girl band ELFRIEDE.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yasukiti01)

__Hometown:__ Anjo, Aichi Prefecture, Japan

Yasutaka Yamamoto debuted as a storyboard maker and a producer with episode 34 of Idaten Jump (2005) after working as an assistant producer for My Melody (2005) He then worked as an assistant director for The Orphans of Simitra (2008), and debuted as a director with Valkyria Chronicles the following year. Since then, he has worked on many productions as a director, storyboard maker, and producer. Some of these titles include: Actually, I Am… (2015), Hinomaru Sumo (2018), and Nekopara (2020).

_Source: Crunchyroll Expo 2020_

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yasukiti01)

Yasutaka Yamamoto debuted as a storyboard maker and a producer with episode 34 of Idaten Jump (2005) after working as an assistant producer for My Melody (2005) He then worked as an assistant director for The Orphans of Simitra (2008), and debuted as a director with Valkyria Chronicles the following year. Since then, he has worked on many productions as a director, storyboard maker, and producer. Some of these titles include: Actually, I Am… (2015), Hinomaru Sumo (2018), and Nekopara (2020).

_Source: Crunchyroll Expo 2020_

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Hakubi_info) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hakubi_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPgWI9gfMkt8xAMqJSRKuuA)

Hakubi is a three-piece Japanese band of mixed gender formed in Kansai in May 2017.

__Members:__
• Katagiri (片桐) – vocalist, guitarist
• Yaskawa Al (ヤスカワアル) – bassist
• Yuuki Matsui (マツイユウキ) – drummer

__Height:__ 151 cm

[Profile (Link Plan)](http://link-plan.net/talent_taketatsu.html) | [Website](http://ayanataketatsu.jp) | [Website (Pony Canyon)](https://ayanataketatsu.jp/) | [Website (Fanclub)](https://ayanakoukoku.com/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/ayana_taketatsu/) | [(Old) Blog](https://ameblo.jp/strawberry-ayana/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayana_take) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayachi_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/taketatsuofficial) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27399.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ayana_Taketatsu) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/竹達彩奈)

Attended Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo before becoming affiliated with her first management company. She works for Link Plan and was formerly affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Assemble Heart. Because of her strong voice, she often voiced tsundere characters.

She is a member of the duo [Petit Milady](https://anilist.co/staff/116523/petit-milady) with fellow voice actress [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686/Aoi-Yuuki).

She married voice actor [Yuuki Kaji](https://anilist.co/staff/95672/) on her 30th birthday in 2019. On June 30, 2022 she announced that she was expecting her first child with Kaji.

**Non-Anime Roles:**

- Anderson - Call of Duty: Black Ops II (VG)

__Aiko Yamagami__ is a Japanese color designer and digital painter.
Background Artist affiliated with studio Stereotype Smartile.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yasukiti01)

__Hometown:__ Anjo, Aichi Prefecture, Japan

Yasutaka Yamamoto debuted as a storyboard maker and a producer with episode 34 of Idaten Jump (2005) after working as an assistant producer for My Melody (2005) He then worked as an assistant director for The Orphans of Simitra (2008), and debuted as a director with Valkyria Chronicles the following year. Since then, he has worked on many productions as a director, storyboard maker, and producer. Some of these titles include: Actually, I Am… (2015), Hinomaru Sumo (2018), and Nekopara (2020).
